member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel
member.summary: Defines Event Log Levels.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.LogAlways
member.summary: No level filtering is done on this log level. Log messages of all levels will be logged.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.Critical
member.summary: Logs that describe an unrecoverable application or system crash, or a catastrophic failure that requires immediate attention.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.Error
member.summary: Logs that highlight when the current flow of execution is stopped due to a failure. These should indicate a failure in the current activity, not an application-wide failure.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.Warning
member.summary: Logs that highlight an abnormal or unexpected event in the application flow, but do not otherwise cause the application execution to stop.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.Informational
member.summary: Logs that track the general flow of the application. These logs should have long-term value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel.Verbose
member.summary: Logs that are used for interactive investigation during development. These logs should primarily contain information useful for debugging and have no long-term value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.IIdentityLogger
member.summary: Interface that needs to be implemented by classes providing logging in Microsoft identity libraries.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.IIdentityLogger.IsEnabled(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.EventLogLevel)
member.summary: Checks to see if logging is enabled at given .

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.IIdentityLogger.Log(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.LogEntry)
member.summary: Writes a log entry.
member.param: Defines a structured message to be logged at the provided .

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient
member.summary: Interface for Telemetry tracking.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the application or client ID that telemetry is being sent for.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient.Initialize
member.summary: Perform any necessary bootstrapping for the telemetry client.
member.remarks: The expectation is that this should only be called once for the lifetime of the object however the implementation should be idempotent.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient.IsEnabled
member.summary: Checks to see if telemetry is enabled all up.
member.returns: Returns if telemetry should be sent; otherwise.
member.remarks: This check should be used to gate any resource intensive operations to generate telemetry as well.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient.IsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Checks to see if telemetry is enabled for the named event.
member.param: Name of the event to check.
member.returns: Returns if telemetry should be sent for ; otherwise.
member.remarks: This check should be used to gate any resource intensive operations to generate telemetry as well.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ITelemetryClient.TrackEvent(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.TelemetryEventDetails)
member.summary: Tracks an instance of a named event.
member.param: Details of the event to track.

member.summary: Tracks an instance of a named event.
member.param: Name of the event to track. Should be unique per scenario.
Key value pair of strings to long with the event.
Key value pair of longs to long with the event.
Key value pair of bools to long with the event.
Key value pair of DateTimes to long with the event.
Key value pair of doubles to long with the event.
Key value pair of Guids to long with the event.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.LogEntry
member.summary: Defines the structure of a log entry.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.LogEntry.EventLogLevel
member.summary: Defines the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.LogEntry.Message
member.summary: Message to be logged.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.LogEntry.CorrelationId
member.summary: A unique identifier for a request that can help with diagnostics across components.
member.remarks: Also referred to as ActivityId in Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.CallContext.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.NullIdentityModelLogger
member.summary: A minimalistic implementation that is disabled by default and doesn't log.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.NullIdentityModelLogger.Instance
member.summary: Default instance of .

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.NullTelemetryClient
member.summary: The default implementation of the interface which swallows all telemetry signals.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.NullTelemetryClient.Instance
member.summary: Singleton instance of .

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.NullTelemetryClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of .
member.remarks: Private constructor to prevent the default constructor being exposed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ObservabilityConstants
member.summary: Common class containing observability constants to be used as well known metric keys.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ObservabilityConstants.Succeeded
member.summary: String used for the name of the property indicating if the call was successful.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ObservabilityConstants.Duration
member.summary: String used for the name of the property indicating the call in Duration (ms).

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ObservabilityConstants.ActivityId
member.summary: String used for the name of the property indicating the call's Activity Id/Correlation Id.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.ObservabilityConstants.ClientId
member.summary: String used for the name of the property indicating the caller's ClientId.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.TelemetryEventDetails
member.summary: Details of the telemetry event.
member.remarks: This implementation is not meant to be thread-safe. This implementation would either need to be overridden or usage should not be concurrently operated on.

member.summary: The underlying properties making up the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.TelemetryEventDetails.Name
member.summary: Name of the telemetry event, should be unique between events.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions.TelemetryEventDetails.Properties
member.summary: Properties which describe the event.
